    • 方法详细资料

      • setConnectionHeader

        public static void setConnectionHeader​(java.net.HttpURLConnection connection,
                                       java.lang.String method)
                                throws java.net.ProtocolException
        Set the connection header for the given connection.
        参数:
        connection - related connection
        method - connection method, "POST" for RequestMethod.POST and "GET" for RequestMethod.GET
        抛出:
        java.net.ProtocolException - when the given method is not supported.

      • buildForm

        public static java.lang.String buildForm​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> form)
        Build a form for the given form data
        参数:
        form - the Map of the form.
        返回:
        the String of the form data.
